prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing Just expressing love for my wife and 3 years old greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Make me a nice card for my wife and my daughter to say I love you with pride theme "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: A&A
From: Rima
Message: "To my amazing A&A, my two favorite people to share snacks and sass with. I'm so proud to call you my family and couldn't imagine my life without my brilliant wife and my tiny, hilarious boss. You two make my world so colorful and fun.

All my love,
Rima"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details







Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "Just expressing love for my wife and 3 years old" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts a stylized, joyful family portrait of two mothers and a small child, capturing a moment of shared laughter and affection. One mother is playfully lifting the toddler, who is giggling, while the other mother looks on with a loving smile, perhaps holding a half-eaten snack. The characters are rendered with soft, flowing watercolor washes in a vibrant, rainbow-inspired palette, symbolizing pride and the colorful world they've built together. Delicate, expressive ink lines define their happy features and the gentle movement of their clothing, giving the illustration a personal, hand-drawn feel. The background is a soft, dreamy wash of warm yellows and pinks, suggesting a sunlit, happy atmosphere, with subtle botanical elements like blooming flowers and leaves framing the scene, adding a touch of natural beauty and growth. The overall effect is heartfelt, intimate, and deeply celebratory of their unique family love.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a Just expressing love for my wife and 3 years old card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts a stylized, joyful family portrait of two mothers and a small child, capturing a moment of shared laughter and affection. One mother is playfully lifting the toddler, who is giggling, while the other mother looks on with a loving smile, perhaps holding a half-eaten snack. The characters are rendered with soft, flowing watercolor washes in a vibrant, rainbow-inspired palette, symbolizing pride and the colorful world they've built together. Delicate, expressive ink lines define their happy features and the gentle movement of their clothing, giving the illustration a personal, hand-drawn feel. The background is a soft, dreamy wash of warm yellows and pinks, suggesting a sunlit, happy atmosphere, with subtle botanical elements like blooming flowers and leaves framing the scene, adding a touch of natural beauty and growth. The overall effect is heartfelt, intimate, and deeply celebratory of their unique family love.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "To my amazing A&A, my two favorite people to share snacks and sass with. I'm so proud to call you my family and couldn't imagine my life without my brilliant wife and my tiny, hilarious boss. You two make my world so colorful and fun.

All my love,
Rima" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts a stylized, joyful family portrait of two mothers and a small child, capturing a moment of shared laughter and affection. One mother is playfully lifting the toddler, who is giggling, while the other mother looks on with a loving smile, perhaps holding a half-eaten snack. The characters are rendered with soft, flowing watercolor washes in a vibrant, rainbow-inspired palette, symbolizing pride and the colorful world they've built together. Delicate, expressive ink lines define their happy features and the gentle movement of their clothing, giving the illustration a personal, hand-drawn feel. The background is a soft, dreamy wash of warm yellows and pinks, suggesting a sunlit, happy atmosphere, with subtle botanical elements like blooming flowers and leaves framing the scene, adding a touch of natural beauty and growth. The overall effect is heartfelt, intimate, and deeply celebratory of their unique family love.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene depicts a stylized, joyful family portrait of two mothers and a small child, capturing a moment of shared laughter and affection. One mother is playfully lifting the toddler, who is giggling, while the other mother looks on with a loving smile, perhaps holding a half-eaten snack. The characters are rendered with soft, flowing watercolor washes in a vibrant, rainbow-inspired palette, symbolizing pride and the colorful world they've built together. Delicate, expressive ink lines define their happy features and the gentle movement of their clothing, giving the illustration a personal, hand-drawn feel. The background is a soft, dreamy wash of warm yellows and pinks, suggesting a sunlit, happy atmosphere, with subtle botanical elements like blooming flowers and leaves framing the scene, adding a touch of natural beauty and growth. The overall effect is heartfelt, intimate, and deeply celebratory of their unique family love.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Front cover of a greeting card with a vibrant, playful, and whimsical cartoon illustration. The style is flat 2D artwork with bold outlines and solid color fills, reminiscent of children's book illustrations. The color palette is very warm and energetic, dominated by yellows, oranges, reds, and blues, with accents of green and purple in the background elements.

The central focus is a playful scene depicting a family's joyful chaos. At the top, a child with blonde hair, wearing an orange shirt, blue pants, and a blue cape, stands triumphantly atop a mound of colorful, oversized pillows. The child is holding a wooden spoon like a scepter and has an ecstatic expression, with confetti-like shapes scattered around them. Below, to the left, a child with blue hair, wearing an orange shirt and green pants, is peeking out from behind a stack of large pillows and has a wide, happy grin. To the right, another child with dark hair, wearing a yellow polka-dotted shirt and green pants, is shown in a more aggressive stance, holding a patterned pillow as if ready for a playful fight, with a determined expression.

A banner with the text "Just expressing love for my wife and 3 years old" is prominently displayed in the center, in a clean, sans-serif, slightly rounded font in orange against a pale yellow background.

The background is a densely packed arrangement of large, abstractly shaped pillows in various bright colors and patterns, creating a feeling of abundance and comfort. Elements of a room are subtly suggested with a lamp in the upper right and a green leafy plant on the far left. The overall mood is humorous, lighthearted, and full of energetic family love, perfectly capturing a moment of shared fun. The composition is full-bleed, with no visible borders.
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The design features a soft, pale yellow background with a subtle paper texture. In the center-left of the image, there is a stylized, plump red pillow with a colorful rainbow arc printed on its surface, consisting of red, orange, yellow, green, and blue bands. To the right of the pillow, a simple wooden spoon lies on its side, angled slightly upwards. Scattered across the background are small, abstract-shaped "sprinkles" in various colors: orange, yellow, blue, and green. The overall composition is clean and minimalist, suggesting a playful yet serene conclusion. There is ample clear space on the right side of the image, suitable for a QR code, and the decorative elements are intentionally kept away from the bottom-right corner to accommodate it. The aesthetic is consistent with a lighthearted and colorful theme.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a humorous and adventurous map-like illustration in a warm, narrative watercolor and ink style. The background is a vibrant, soft gradient of yellow, orange, and pink, transitioning to hints of purple and blue at the bottom, suggesting a playful, energetic atmosphere. The artwork is flat 2D, with full-bleed elements. The central focus is a whimsical depiction of a "Pillow Fortress of Sass" represented by a teal couch with plush purple and orange pillows, labeled with a speech bubble. Below this, a "Canyon of Lost Snacks" is illustrated, showing the same couch from a different angle, with a few scattered snacks (cookies, candies, pink food items) visible. A winding blue "Giggle River" flows from the snacks, carrying a purple juice box with a smiling sun face and a red straw. A dashed "Path of Conquest" leads from the river towards a wooden treasure chest at the bottom right. Two yellow, triangular "Danger" signs are present: one labeled "DANGER" with an exclamation mark, and another labeled "SECRET ROUTE" with a stylized female gender symbol inside. Small, sketchy green grass blades are scattered throughout the scene. The overall composition is busy yet organized, with clear labels and a sense of playful exploration, perfectly fitting the humorous and lighthearted tone. All text is in bold, black, sans-serif lettering within stylized, pill-shaped speech bubbles or signs, ensuring legibility. The art style is consistent with charming, slightly imperfect ink outlines and soft, blended watercolor fills, giving it a hand-drawn, artistic feel.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The central focus is a beautifully rendered, handwritten message in elegant, legible cursive script, flowing gracefully with natural character. The text is integrated into a charming decorative scene. The background is a soft, creamy color. Scattered around the text and framing the bottom half of the image are whimsical, playful elements: golden stars of various sizes, small orange hearts, and a large golden trophy filled with colorful building blocks, a bitten cookie, and a crayon. These elements create a sense of fun and celebration, echoing the "snacks and sass" and "colorful and fun" sentiment of the message. The overall aesthetic is cheerful, warm, and personal, with a slight texture suggesting watercolor paper. The artistic style is consistent with a charming, flat 2D illustration suitable for printing, with a focus on soft color blending and fine ink details. The arrangement of the trophy and scattered motifs provides ample clear space for the handwritten message, ensuring it remains the primary focus while being visually supported by the surrounding artwork.

Prompt:
Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a warm, narrative watercolor and ink illustration style. The central focus is the handwritten message "To my amazing A&A, my two favorite people to share snacks and sass with. I'm so proud to call you my family and couldn't imagine my life without my brilliant wife and my tiny, hilarious boss. You two make my world so colorful and fun. All my love, Rima" in a beautiful, clearly readable, flowing cursive script with natural character and warmth, resembling sophisticated but approachable calligraphy. The message is positioned in the upper two-thirds of the image, with ample clear space around it. The background is a soft, creamy, textured watercolor wash. The lower third of the image features a charming decorative scene: a golden trophy with a pedestal and handles, filled to the brim with colorful building blocks (red, blue, yellow, green, purple), a partially eaten chocolate chip cookie, and a yellow crayon with blue stripes. The trophy and its contents are rendered with soft watercolor textures and subtle ink outlines. Surrounding the message and the trophy are scattered playful, charming embellishments: small golden stars of varying sizes, and small orange hearts, all rendered in a soft watercolor style with delicate ink details. The overall composition is balanced, with the message clearly readable and the decorative elements enhancing the joyful and affectionate tone of the card. Flat 2D artwork for printing, full-bleed background.
